alert.note: Alert for Gibson (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 01 at 9:34AM EST until March 05 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana... Patoka River near Princeton. .Continuing dry weather will allow the river level to fall the rest of the week. For the Patoka River...including Princeton...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Patoka River near Princeton. * WHEN...Until early Saturday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 AM CST Tuesday the stage was 19.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Friday evening and continue falling to 12.0 feet Friday, March 11. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
